Our Story

Modern Investing.

Compound your capital faster by investing into the best companies building our future.

We invest towards the future. Every generation, there are new market forces—driven by technology, regulatory, and social changes—that enable well positioned companies to deliver above average earnings growth. That’s our focus.
Internet-Connected Assets
The global proliferation of always-on mobile devices has connected our houses, cars, and cash to the internet. New services are improving the productivity of our assets, creating a variety of investable opportunities.

Our Approach
Think Global
The portfolio is comprised of 25-30 public securities of medium and large-cap companies from around the world. We benchmark against the S&P 500.
Look Forward
Our focus is on business models that are quickly gaining share, typically as the result of a key technological development.
Focus on Profits
We ensure target investments are generating a double digit return on invested capital, and are disciplined about the prices we pay for shares.
Founder, CIO
Robert Cantwell founded Upholdings in 2019 to develop benchmark beating investment strategies.
Prior to Upholdings, Robert built and led the finance and operations departments for Everlane, a modern brand offering ethically-sourced apparel over the web.

As an investor, Robert has spent his career under the instruction of Roger McNamee, former head of the top performing T. Rowe Price Science & Technology Fund, and founder of Silver Lake and Elevation Partners. Roger is both an investor and advisor to Upholdings.
